p: Considering all hospitalizations with a diagnosis of influenza, the proportion of deaths increased with age, from 0.5% in age‐group <20 years to 10% in age‐group ≥80 years. The proportion of deaths for hospitalizations with ICU admission was 22% and increased with age, from 11% in the <20 years to 32% in the ≥80 years. Among all deaths, 54% concerned patients aged ≥80 years (Table 3).
